short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flash Cards for the student learning division facts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Division Study Cards is designed for the student learning division tables through twelve.  Questions and answers are presented in an electronic version of the traditional note card study method.

Read the question, respond with your answer and then flip the card to see if you were correct.

Once you've completed a pass of all of the cards you can reset the deck to start again.
